title: Why is the song Hotel California so famous amongst guitarists? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hotel California is famous amongst​ most guitarists because of the iconic guitar solo towards the end of the song. That particular guitar solo sounds amazing and is very unique. The song on the whole is very famous and that's one of the reasons why the guitar solo became popular and over the years, musicians have tried to recreate the song. Thank you :)

It has the amazing intro which involves picking, then it has all these small riffs going on throughout the song which sound great, and then the iconic guitar solo. That solo has been rated one of the best solos ever. Also the drums sound pretty cool in the song.
